programme.title: Freedom in America
programme.short_synopsis: Do spontaneous protests occur? Alistair Cooke explores Rosa Parks’ infamous bus ride.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke ponders on spontaneous protests and reveals what led up to Rosa Parks changing American history.
